paper_abstract: The Seventeenth International Conference on Antomated Planning and Scheduling (ICAPS-07) was held in Providence, Rhode Island, in September 2007. It covered the latest theoretical and practical advances in planning and scheduling. The conference was collocated with the Thirteenth International Conference on Principles and Practice of Constraint Programming (CP-07). The program consisted of tutorials, workshops, system demonstrations, a doctoral consortium, and three days of technical presentations mostly in parallel sessions. ICAPS-07 also hosted the second edition of the International Competition on Knowledge Engineering for Planning and Scheduling. This report describes the conference in more detail.
paper_title: The Seventeenth International Conference on Automated Planning and Scheduling (ICAPS-07)
